Reviews.Title: “Nice View, Noisy Nights”
Reviews.Author: Happytravellerman
Reviews.Content: spent 4 nights seaview hotel midfebruary 2012 hotel modern looking spectacular clean reception staff efficient friendly 10 minutes entering hotel spacious bed bath shower screen tv english language channels importantly 3rd floor clean daily servicing towel exchange wifi internet available free reception poor unworkable depending time day times walked onto corridor laptop signal load page eventually coffee downstairs checked emails cost internet aed 15 30 minutes aed 25 1 hour options patience wouldnt survive hour system warned log whilst credit lose lot carry forward credit hotel eating options available meals available day harbour cafe foyer nice indian chinese restaurants top floor live music till hours hotel provides salon ladies addition nightclub called marines accessed ground floor actually mezzanine level excellent rock band playing night 10pm 3am aware lot girls mother noise restaurants 7th floor marines rock band mezzanine playing till 3am reference living 3rd floor idea reception desk noise hotel difference sleeping till 3am yourself

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, food not”
Reviews.Author: Robert O
Reviews.Content: nice clean hotel forget clubs rooftop bar sit outside relaxing nice view port friendly staff impressed food breakfast bad limited choice cheese example nice stay value

Reviews.Title: “They were busy renovating”
Reviews.Author: yoliswat
Reviews.Content: visited hotel august renovations nice experience pool water drained swim am nice experienc renovations served nice breakfast friendly helpful staff hotel centrally located close harbor

Reviews.Title: “Port View”
Reviews.Author: TitoRon
Reviews.Content: hotel opposite port clean pay 50 dirhams 1 free drink ladies pleasure nightclub left band bet nice clean hotel relatively cheap dubai

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel with a gr8 view from the rooftop”
Reviews.Author: rahulormatu
Reviews.Content: hello nice complimentary pool top view sea burj khalifa otherthe bit size reach dubai wasting timei advise choose enjoyed hotel

Reviews.Title: “Not bad at all for the money!”
Reviews.Author: michael1953
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel times past honest clean food fine standard hotel handy local shops main shopping taxi ride break bank pay named dubai 5 star hotel dont pay prices facilities excellent value money hesitation saying book night club speciality restaurants hotel dubai male own chances try pick looking shop window dont buy dont tip busy exhibition times rush hour taxis hard book advance hotel car found staff helpful remember behaviour breeds behaviour

Reviews.Title: “Not worth it !! Pls Avoid!”
Reviews.Author: ssuri81
Reviews.Content: unhappy hotel staying dubai hotel close city center moved friends booking hotel firstly nonsmoking couldnt enter due bad stench smoke smell entering requested change refused due nonavailability front guest reservation furious service extra bed friends stay breakfast ordinary options orange juice diluted extent looked orange water hardly flavor luckily hotel night strongly recommend look options

Reviews.Title: “Sleepless nights”
Reviews.Author: binghamStevenage
Reviews.Content: hotel fair value money central location prepared plenty taxi rides cheap relative uk staff friendly except reception found bordering sullen biggest gripe noise hotel nightclub 3am morning change 130am overlooking port overlooking building site manager compensated deducting cost meal costing £750 checking reception charged phone calls didnt meals didnt hotels offer ones money

Reviews.Title: “good location, nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: othmane
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel october 4 nights spacious view arabic gulf cleaned day complimentary newspaper provided everyday bit difficult sleep night 3 night clubs overall hotel location bur dubai

Reviews.Title: “overpriced, old, just about average - nothing special really - keep it as a last resort”
Reviews.Author: pcontact
Reviews.Content: found hotel overpriced facilities comfort offers except bur dubai convenient reach trade center dont specific reason congested fashion design breakfast uninteresting overall property uninteresting purely average worth price

Reviews.Title: “ok!- would not like to stay there again.”
Reviews.Author: May2010London
Reviews.Content: travelled dubai 24th april 2010 7 nights stayed sea view hotel warmly greeted lovely reception impressed friendly welcoming staff soon checked wasnt highly impressed basic instead sea view promised view outside window huge grey building construction half grown garden extremely disappointing hotel clean bed covers toilets cleaned everyday despite please clean sign service speaking hotel staff via telephone difficult odd occassion 1 answer call 2 repeat yourself 2 3 times didnt particulary location hotel ran free shutter buses dropped picked jumeriah beach timing 1030am 230pm time spend beach breakfast lovely variety food lots chose spoken rudely arab gentleman telling late breakfast 10am infact breakfast closed 1030am owner hotel extremely rude agree comments regarding noise nightclubs expensive hotel taxi cheaper normal taxi recommend hotel people intend stay couple days mainly business noise nightclub contradict recommend hotel romantic stay family holiday children glad spent day sleep

Reviews.Title: “INSOMNIACS NIGHTMARE-BUT..........CLEAN, FRIENDLY, RELAXING - DAY TIME ONLY!”
Reviews.Author: petematthews
Reviews.Content: agree reviews mention noise night clubs read reviews deliberately 5th flooras avoid noise nice facing port 6th floor fine indian restaurant 7th floor worth visit food 8 dancers hysterical watch dance totally bored danced sync excellent ageing julio asian singer tried gee none funny music loud hardly hear yourself proximity found watching tv everynight till 3am eventually hotel quietish hoped nights sleep insomnia weeks found siesta 68 actually nap fear hearing drums rattling round inside head party lover hotel geared towards buisness slightly surprised noise levels plus found food restaurants staff especially samir lounge bar attentive friendly 2 girls lads watchful eye travel alwys friendly virtually found staff excellent found price alcohol little gather dubai cant complain clean tidy ac dream plus service laundry service shish roof pleasant surroundings pool centre chose dine alfresco friendly attentive staff feel welcome little flirty wasnt offensive pool little relax day read book drink sun roof top life guards whilst pool talkative friendly experience im thinking repeating time catch cricket finals friendly bar staff delight pretty unimpressed cricket loving dubai

Reviews.Title: “Good value, but noisy!”
Reviews.Author: BRetraveler
Reviews.Content: am lucky 5th floor theres noisy night club hotel silent night bring earplugs fun club hot location fair price service travel desk people ready help arranging organized tours
